summary: Daily log app with added nutrition tracking needs (water intake and daily protein servings).

existing_features.title: Add a per-date water intake tracker that lets the user record how many glasses of water they drank for the selected date (YYYY-MM-DD), with controls to increment/decrement and a visible total.

Add a per-date protein tracker that records completion of a daily goal of two scoops of protein for the selected date, with a clear 0/2, 1/2, 2/2 progress UI and quick controls to mark a scoop as completed or undo it.

Implement React Query cache keys and hooks for reading/updating the per-date water-glasses and protein-scoops tracker values, using localStorage storage keyed by (principal, date) when authenticated, and a stable anonymous fallback key when not authenticated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a daily water intake tracker (number of glasses per day).
Add a daily protein intake tracker (track two scoops of protein per day).

projectName: Add per-day water glasses tracker and protein scoops tracker
